{{dcl|num=1|since=c++23|1=

    requires std::default_initializable&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;Base&gt;&gt; = default;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++23|1=
constexpr /*iterator*/( /*iterator*/&lt;!Const&gt; i )
    requires Const &amp;&amp;
        std::convertible_to&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;V&gt;, ranges::iterator_t&lt;Base&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=3|notes={{mark expos}}|1=
private:
constexpr explicit /*iterator*/( ranges::iterator_t&lt;Base&gt; current,
                                 difference_type pos);
}}
{{dcl end}}

Construct an iterator.

@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/value_initialization|Value-initializes]] the underlying iterator {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} with {{c|ranges::iterator_t&lt;Base&gt;()}} and 
the underlying index {{rlpi|/#Data members|pos_}} with {{c|0}}.

@2@ Conversion from {{c|/*iterator*/&lt;false&gt;}} to {{c|/*iterator*/&lt;true&gt;}}. Initializes {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} with {{box|{{c/core|std::}}{{ltt|cpp/utility/move}}{{c/core|(i.current_)}}}} and {{rlpi|/#Data members|pos_}} with {{box|{{tt|i.}}{{rlpi|/#Data members|pos_}}}}.

@3@ A private constructor which is used by {{ltt|cpp/ranges/enumerate_view/begin|enumerate_view::begin}} and {{ltt|cpp/ranges/enumerate_view/end|enumerate_view::end}}. This constructor is not accessible to users. Initializes {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} with {{c|std::move(current)}} and {{rlpi|/#Data members|pos_}} with {{c|pos}}.
